bugFixes: Resolved an issue in the Companyâ€™s Provider section that prevented establishing a connection to Azure DevOps when the `Git Provider` capability and `Client Credentials` authentication method settings were selected.
We fixed a bug that prevented the selected Mia-Assistant model from being retained when pinning the chat.
We fixed an issue that prevented clipboard copy/paste actions from working in iframe extensions.

improvements.title: Import Stream Processor schema in service configuration
description: In the Design Area, when configuring the `config.json` file of the Stream Processor, now it is possible to import the [Stream Processor schema](https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/runtime/platform/data-fabric/stream-processor/v0.5.4/stream-processor.schema.json) from Mia CDN, to enable schema-based validation and linting in Monaco editors.

bugFixes: Fixed a bug in the Asset tab editor of a Software Catalog item that prevented JSON validation errors from being highlighted, causing users to see only a generic error message upon saving changes.
